title: Trump says Venezuela opposition leader Machado 'coming in next week'
shortDescription: Donald Trump said in a Jan. 8 interview on Fox News's "Hannity" that he would "look forward to saying hello" to the 2025 Nobel Peace Prize winner.

title: Trump DOGE cuts cause scramble to feed troops at nuclear defense base
shortDescription: The remote Army base is responsible for shooting down nuclear missiles targeting the US.

title: GOP divisions on display as House votes to extend Obamacare subsidies
shortDescription: House Republicans bucked GOP leaders on Jan. 8 by voting to restore and extend the Affordable Care Act premium tax credits for three years.

title: Did Barron Trump really propose to the Princess of Denmark?
shortDescription: A pitch for Barron Trump to marry Isabella, Princess of Denmark, amid U.S. efforts to acquire Greenland, has gone viral. Here's the latest.

title: Trump considers a second floor to West Wing for ballroom 'symmetry'
shortDescription: President Trump's ballroom architect said he is exploring the construction of an additional second story to the White House's West Wing colonnade

title: House fails to override Trump vetoes
shortDescription: The House could not clear the two-thirds majority needed overturn President Trump's first two vetoes of his second term.

title: Senate votes to block Trump from Venezuela action
shortDescription: The bipartisan measure will halt further American military intervention in Venezuela without congressional approval.

title: Republicans vote to advance Senate measure to halt Trump in Venezuela
shortDescription: The Senate advanced a bipartisan measure to halt further American military action in Venezuela without congressional approval.
